articles.description: Steven Gerrard has turned down the chance to return to Rangers for a second stint as manager.
articles.title: Rangers: Steven Gerrard rejects chance to return as Ibrox manager

articles.description: Portugal host Republic of Ireland in World Cup qualifying at Estadio Jose Alvalade in Lisbon
articles.title: Build-up as Portugal host Republic of Ireland in World Cup qualifying

articles.description: Nottingham Forest could turn to former Everton and Burnley boss Sean Dyche if Ange Postecoglou leaves the club.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Sean Dyche considered if Ange Postecoglou sacked

articles.description: David Allen's fairytale big Sheffield headline fight ends in a unanimous points loss to Russian Arslanbek Makhmudov.
articles.title: David Allen v Arslanbek Makhmudov: Defeat in Sheffield for Doncaster boxer

articles.description: Off the back of an impressive try-scoring Super League Grand Final performance, has Hull KR's Mikey Lewis played himself into starting for England in the Ashes series?
articles.title: Mikey Lewis: Has Hull KR stand-off played his way into starting for England in Ashes?

articles.description: Nat Sciver-Brunt and Sophie Ecclestone deliver statement showings as India and Australia loom, but England are still searching for the complete performance, writes Ffion Wynne.
articles.title: Nat Sciver-Brunt and Sophie Ecclestone deliver statement performances as India and Australia loom

articles.description: Tiger Woods has disc replacement surgery in the latest setback to stall his return to the PGA Tour.
articles.title: Tiger Woods: 15-time major winner has further back surgery

articles.description: Manchester City forward Erling Haaland hit his sixth international hat-trick in a 5-0 win against Israel as Norway close in on a 2026 World Cup place.
articles.title: Erling Haaland hat-trick puts Norway closer to 2026 World Cup qualification

articles.description: Luke Littler beats Jonny Clayton and Luke Humphries edges past Danny Noppert to set up a showdown in the World Grand Prix final.
articles.title: World Grand Prix: Luke Littler and Luke Humphries set up a final showdown

articles.description: Novak Djokovic suffers a shock defeat by Monegasque qualifier Valentin Vacherot in the semi-finals of the Shanghai Masters.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic knocked out of Shanghai Masters by world number 204 Valentin Vacherot
